what is cuims: CUIMS is the official Chandigarh University portal for academics, attendance, results, timetable, and student services.
how to login to cuims: Use your UID or registered email and password to log in at https://uims.cuchd.in.
forgot cuims password: Click 'Forgot Password' on the CUIMS login page and follow instructions sent to your registered email.
cuims not opening: Clear browser cache or try using incognito mode. If problem continues, contact IT helpdesk.
how to check attendance: Log in to CUIMS → Academics → Attendance to view course-wise attendance.
attendance short kya kare: Talk to your course incharge or coordinator. Attend all upcoming classes.
what is blackboard: Blackboard is CU’s Learning Management System for online classes, notes, assignments, and quizzes.
how to access blackboard: Visit https://lms.cuchd.in or open Blackboard through CUIMS.
blackboard not loading: Clear cache, refresh the page, or try another browser.
how to change section: Section change is not generally allowed; contact department HOD.
how to register for reappear exam: CUIMS → Examination → Reappear Form → Fill form → Pay online.
how to pay fees: CUIMS → Accounts → Pay Fees Online using UPI, card, or netbanking.
late fee penalty cu: Late fee is charged if payment is not done before the due date.
how to change hostel room: Apply via CUIMS → Hostel Management or contact warden.
hostel outpass kaise apply kare: CUIMS → Hostel Outpass and wait for approval.
hostel timings: Usually 7 PM (girls) and 10 PM (boys) — varies by block.
what to do if id card is lost: Report to admin office and apply for duplicate via CUIMS.
how to get id card: ID card is given after admission. Duplicate via CUIMS → Student Services.
how to get bonafide certificate: CUIMS → Certificates → Apply for Bonafide Certificate.
how to apply for bus service: CUIMS → Transport Services → Apply for Bus Pass.
bus routes and timings: Available under Transport section on CUIMS.
placement record of cu: 900+ companies visit with packages up to ₹50 LPA+.
how to apply for internship: CUIMS → Internships → Apply or Upload Offer Letter.
cu wifi issue: Contact IT helpdesk or raise a complaint in CUIMS.
open elective kaise choose kare: CUIMS → Course Registration during elective window.
add drop request: Available only during the add/drop window.
cu scholarship details: Scholarships available for CUCET rank, sports, NCC, defense, alumni, etc.
cucet kya hai: CUCET is CU's Common Entrance Test for scholarships.
mess menu cu: Mess menu available on hostel notice boards and CUIMS.
gym facility cu: Gym available in several hostel blocks.
clubs and societies: Dance, music, coding, drama, robotics, sports clubs available.
how to join cu clubs: Attend club orientation or check CUIMS events.
fests in cu: CU Fest, Sports Fiesta, Innovation Fest, Freshers, Departmental fests.
freshers party: Usually organised by departments in the first weeks.
cu medical facility: Medical Centre with ambulance is available.
block locations: Refer to CU campus map or helpdesk.
nearest atm: ATMs near Block A and Main Gate.
weekend classes: Sometimes labs or extra classes are scheduled.
placement training: Soft skills and aptitude training provided by CU.
cu hostel rules: Maintain attendance, use outpass, no loud noise, follow timings.
cu convocation details: Declared on CU website and CUIMS.
exam rules: Carry ID card, admit card, follow seating plan.
